content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello, Maria. I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much were you considering to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your time, Mister Heine. I'm looking for a place that I can afford as a student. I'm very dependable and responsible, and I want to maintain a good relationship with my landlord. I've seen similar apartments in the area for around $1,200 per month. Would you be willing to negotiate on the price?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Maria, as a student, I understand that budget is important. I'm willing to negotiate a fair price for you. How does $1,250 per month sound to you? This includes all utilities, so you won't have to worry about additional costs.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your offer, Mister Heine. $1,250 per month is a bit higher than what I was hoping for. I appreciate that it includes utilities, but I'm on a tight budget as a student. Would you be able to lower the price a bit? Perhaps to $1,150? That would be more in line with what I can afford.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Maria, I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,200 per month? This would be a fair price for both parties, considering the location and amenities of the apartment. Would you agree to this price?
name: Heinrich Heine
